front.title: CMP Interoperability Testing: Results and Agreements

abstract.t: This memo describes the results of the first two interoperabilitytests of public key infrastructure (PKI) implementations based onRFC 2459, RFC 2510, and RFC 2511. PKI implementations fall intothree general classes: certification authorities (CAs), registrationauthorities (RAs), and PKI clients. Interoperability testingfocused on transactions to obtain and revoke certificates.
